entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING ENDED, Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:03 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.7°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or rain changing to rain near midnight. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches developing in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog patches dissipating in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
